Meet Our Director

FUTO was one of the six Federal Universities selected for the project, after a very competitive process. The primary objective of FUTO CE-sPESS is to provide innovative and sustainable capacity building and professionalization in sustainable procurement, environmental Standards, and social standards to meet the needs of the public and private sectoes in the country and the African region. The pioneer centre director is Engr. Prof. Gloria A. Chukwudebe.

Prof. Gloria A. C

Estimated time

4 months at 5-10 hours/week

The Center runs executive short and degree course in B.SC, PGD, M.SC & MPS.

The profile of the degree programmes are as follows:

  • Procurement Management B.Sc.; PGD; M.Sc MPS.
  • Enviromental Standards B.Sc; PGD; M.Sc. MPS.
  • Social Standards B.Sc; PGD; M.Sc. MPS.
